title: IVA's de Vaulx Likes Astellas Pharma: A Great Bargain (Audio)
itunes:title: IVA's de Vaulx Likes Astellas Pharma: A Great Bargain (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Charles de Vaulx, CIO of International Value Advisers (IVA), with a macro look at gold, equities - and the stocks he favors.
